text: Wazirabad Tehsil () is a tehsil of Gujranwala District, Punjab, Pakistan. Wazirabad is on the banks of the Chenab River nearly 100 kilometres north of Lahore on the Grand Trunk Road. It is 45 kilometres from Sialkot, 30 kilometres from the district capital, Gujranwala, and about 12 kilometres from Gujrat. ==Other websites== *Panjabi Grammar: A Brief Grammar of Panjabi As Spoken in the Wazirabad District Category:Tehsils of Gujranwala District
title: Wazirabad Tehsil
